Name: Caipirovska
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils from zest.
SHAKE with 7oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.
Review: Vodka replaces cachaça in this Caipirinha-style drink.
